pageContext.claim: “I said [to Brian Kemp], ‘You got to win the election.’ You won the election, you won it fairly easily against their star.”
pageContext.analysis: Kemp defeated Stacey Abrams by 1.4 points after an election disputed for weeks. Kemp declined to recuse himself from his job as Georgia's top election official even as he ran for governor, and faced allegations of voter suppression.
